definition: to emit/to give off/to send out (or up, forth)/to brave/to face/reckless/to falsely adopt (sb's identity etc)/to feign/(literary) to cover
adventurism (a left-wing error against Mao's line during the 1930s)
The Moment of Truth (TV show)/Truth or Dare (game)
pinyin: Zhen1 xin1 hua4 Da4 Mao4 xian3

sentences.english: With all the variety and adventure, Able Seaman Green said she enjoyed her work.
sentences.chinese: 面对变化和冒险，二等兵格林说她非常喜欢她的工作。

sentences.english: He was also a reckless adventurer who got lucky.
sentences.chinese: 同时他也是一位轻率鲁莽而运气十足的冒险家。

sentences.english: An insane risk, Fache told himself.
sentences.chinese: 一次疯狂的冒险，法希想。

sentences.english: Underestimate Ren at your peril, Ren's competitors say.
sentences.chinese: 竞争对手们说，小看任正非就是在冒险。

sentences.english: We court risk more avidly as teens than at any other time.
sentences.chinese: 法庭审讯青少年的冒险行为比其他任何时候都多。

sentences.english: Many explorers hoped to discover Eldorado, the fabled City of Gold.
sentences.chinese: 冒险家都梦想找到埃尔多拉多这个传说中的黄金之城。

sentences.english: So when she goes to the law school she takes a serious risk.
sentences.chinese: 所以她来读法学院是相当冒险的。

sentences.english: I must wonder how far is too far when venturing into a virtual reality.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道当冒险进入虚拟现实时走多远才算可以？

sentences.english: The insecurity of the venture kept investors away.
sentences.chinese: 这种冒险事业的不安全性使投资者望而却步。

sentences.english: Other significant subplots include the adventures of Lydia, the youngest Bennet daughter.
sentences.chinese: 其它重要的次要情节包括班奈特家小女丽迪雅的冒险。

sentences.english: And risk it all on one turn of pitch-and-toss.
sentences.chinese: 孤注一掷的冒险失败后。

sentences.english: We enjoy the adventure, the comfort and the companionship that friendship offers.
sentences.chinese: 我们喜欢友谊给我们带来的冒险，安慰和陪伴。

sentences.english: Don't take foolish liberties on the ski slopes.
sentences.chinese: 不要在滑雪坡道上作愚蠢地冒险。

sentences.english: The site pegged me as a centric venturer.
sentences.chinese: 网站把我定为“轻度冒险者”。

sentences.english: The one activity Palau is most famous for among adventurous travelers is diving.
sentences.chinese: 对喜爱冒险的游客来说，帛琉最出名的活动就是潜水。

sentences.english: So how can you be best prepared for this adventure?
sentences.chinese: 那么你怎样才能最好的应对这种冒险经历呢？

definition: to explore/to go on an expedition/adventure
nine deaths and still alive (idiom); a narrow escape/new lease of life
to stake all on one throw
to seek survival/to possess the will to live
